title: Man v. Food: Carnivore Chronicles
overview: Adam Richman takes a trip down to his favorite meat-centric, chow-down Meccas, beefed up with brand new commentary and juicy, never-before-seen footage. On the culinary quest for the meatiest meals the USA has to offer, Man v. Food: Carnivore Chronicles gives viewers an exclusive look at the sumptuous food, the chefs, and their cities.
